ddf.catalog.data

Interface AttributeDescriptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeDescriptorImpl, FeatureAttributeDescriptor

    public interface AttributeDescriptor
extends Serializable
    AttributeDescriptor describes an Attribute and associates it with a AttributeType

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this AttributeDescriptor
      AttributeType<?> getType()
      Returns the AttributeType of Attributes described by this AttributeDescriptor.
      boolean isIndexed()
      Whether or not this Attribute should be indexed by Source implementations, therefore part of Query evaluation.
      boolean isMultiValued()
      Returns whether or not Attributes described by this AttributeDescriptor are multivalued, that is, Attribute.getValue() returns a List.
      boolean isStored()
      Returns whether or not Source implementations must store the value of this Attribute.
      boolean isTokenized()
      If the AttributeType.AttributeFormat of this Attribute is AttributeType.AttributeFormat.STRING, returns whether or not Source implementations should tokenize it; removing stopwords, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this AttributeDescriptor
        Returns:
        String - the name of this AttributeDescriptor

      • isMultiValued

        boolean isMultiValued()
        Returns whether or not Attributes described by this AttributeDescriptor are multivalued, that is, Attribute.getValue() returns a List.
        Returns:
        whether or not it is multivalued

      • getType

        AttributeType<?> getType()
        Returns the AttributeType of Attributes described by this AttributeDescriptor.
        Returns:
        AttributeType - the type of values of Attributes described by this AttributeDescriptor

      • isIndexed

        boolean isIndexed()
        Whether or not this Attribute should be indexed by Source implementations, therefore part of Query evaluation.
        Some Attributes may only want to be stored, not indexed.
        Returns:
        boolean - whether or not to index the associated Attribute
        See Also:
        isStored()

      • isTokenized

        boolean isTokenized()
        If the AttributeType.AttributeFormat of this Attribute is AttributeType.AttributeFormat.STRING, returns whether or not Source implementations should tokenize it; removing stopwords, etc.

        This method is only relevant to Attributes with an AttributeType.AttributeFormat of AttributeType.AttributeFormat.STRING

        Some Attributes may only need to be stored, not indexed (or vice versa).
        Returns:
        boolean - whether or not to tokenize values of associated Attributes
        See Also:
        isStored()

      • isStored

        boolean isStored()
        Returns whether or not Source implementations must store the value of this Attribute. Some Attributes may only need to be indexed, not stored (or vice versa).
        Returns:
        boolean - whether or not to store this Attribute
        See Also:
        isIndexed()
